## Square relative error per month

Expliquer le graphique et mettre un titre au chunk. Blabla sur l'erreur, qu'est ce que ca mesure...
SRE = $\left(\frac{Y - R}{R}\right)^2$

```{ojs}
addTooltips(
  Plot.plot({
    x: {
      domain: d3.sort(ave_errors, d => -d.MSRE).map(d => d.Entries),
      axis: null
    },
    y: {
      grid: true,
      label: "↑ SRE",
      transform: d => d / 1e6

    },
    color: {
      legend: true
    },
    fx: {
      label: null,
      tickFormat: (d) => d.toLocaleString('en-US', { month: 'long', year: 'numeric' }),    
      reverse: false
    },
    facet: {data: errors, x: "Date"},
    marks: [
      Plot.barY(errors, {
          x: "Model", 
          y: "Errors", 
          fill: "Model",
          sort: {
            x: {value: "y", reverse: true}
          },
          title: (d) =>
              `${d.Model}: \n ${d.Errors / 1e6} millions`
        }),
      Plot.ruleY([0])
    ]
  })
)
```

## Mean square relative error

Expliquer le graphique et mettre un titre au chunk. Blabla sur l'erreur, qu'est ce que ca mesure...
MSRE = $\frac{1}{n}\sum_\limits{i=1}^n\left(\frac{Y_i - R_i}{R_i}\right)^2$

```{ojs}
viewof doweighted = Inputs.toggle({label: "Weighted mean", value: false})
```

```{ojs}
addTooltips(
  Plot.plot({
    x: {
      domain: d3.sort(ave_errors, d => -d.MSRE).map(d => d.Entries),
      label: null
    },
    y: {
      grid: true,
      transform: doweighted ? d => d / 1e6 * weight : d => d / 1e6

    },
    color: {
      legend: true
    },
    marks: [
      Plot.barY(ave_errors, {
                x: "Entries", 
                y: "MSRE",
                fill: "Entries",
                sort: {
                        x: {value: "y", reverse: true}
                      },
                title: (d) =>
                    `${d.Entries}: \n ${doweighted ? d.MSRE / 1e6 * weight : d.MSRE / 1e6} millions (n = ${d.N}) `
                }),
      Plot.ruleY([0])
    ]
  })
)
```

<!-- DATA -->

```{r}
#| cache: false

targets::tar_load(past_submissions_tourism, store = "store_post_mortem")
targets::tar_load(recent_data_tourism, store = "store_post_mortem")

past_submissions_tourism <- past_submissions_tourism |>
  dplyr::filter(Entries %in% c("REGARIMA", "XGBOOST", "DFM", "ETS", "LSTM"))

error_country_model<-past_submissions_tourism |>
  tibble::tibble() |> 
  dplyr::rename(geo = Country, time = Date, forecast = value)|>
  dplyr::inner_join(recent_data_tourism, by= c("geo", "time")) |>
  dplyr::mutate(error_squared = (forecast - values)^2/values)|>
  dplyr::select(geo, time, Entries, error_squared)

average_error <- error_country_model|>
  dplyr::group_by(geo, Entries) |>
  dplyr::summarize(
    N = dplyr::n(),
    MSRE = mean(error_squared)
  )

ojs_define(data = recent_data_tourism, pred = past_submissions_tourism, errors_data = error_country_model, ave_errors_data = average_error)
```
